title: Stinger Necklace
summaries: The Stinger Necklace is a pre-Hardmode accessory that is obtainable after defeating the Queen Bee. This item combines the Shark Tooth Necklace and the Honey Comb accessories, giving the player 5 armor penetration as well as releasing 1-3 / 1-4 bees when the wearer takes damage and granting the Honey buff for 5 seconds.

statistics.Tooltip:
Increases armor penetration by 5
Releases bees and douses the user in honey when damaged
statistics.Sell: 3
